Room.Name: East Balcony
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the eastern balcony overlooking the island of Eeste.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the lake and the mountains surrounding the lake from this part of the balcony. You can also see a giant sea monster attacking a small boat in the middle of the lake. You continue to rest on the balcony as people wander in and out of this room.
